SV025.SV025_Area500_Talk_Intro_00:
[Npc:Icon chara="Charlie"/][UE:Meta key="b513a37ddc794233b261d1ab62f8f6dc" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]Hey,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] the name's [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Charlie"/]Don Bergman[Npc:EmphasisEnd/].[etc:Wait frame="15"/] I'm just here
fighting the good fight on behalf of the
little guys.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="b513a37ddc794233b261d1ab62f8f6dc" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="TalkFaceOnly"/]Oh![etc:Wait frame="8"/] We've already met,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] haven't we?[etc:Wait frame="15"/]
Sorry about that!
SV025.SV025_Area500_Talk_HappyTalk_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Charlie"/][UE:Meta key="821310edaf954ab1987049b5e9d3e8c3" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]With me,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] you've got a friend for life,
[Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Happy"/]Oatchi[Npc:EmphasisEnd/].[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Can't wait to see where the
future takes us!
SV025.SV025_Area500_Talk_HappyTalk_02:
[Npc:Icon chara="Charlie"/][UE:Meta key="c7e0d91fdac647c3ae0beb37041a9874" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]You've got some good eyes on you,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] pal.[etc:Wait frame="15"/]
Just think of all the things those eyes
have seen.
SV025.SV025_Area500_Talk_Hint_01_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Charlie"/][UE:Meta key="6d7be23166ea4417aeb7f07f312fa79e" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]Once I learned about [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Olimar"/]Olimar[Npc:EmphasisEnd/]'s Voyage
Log,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I changed course and flew to this
planet right away.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="6d7be23166ea4417aeb7f07f312fa79e" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="SadFaceOnly2"/]Then,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] right before we landed,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] the ship
became inoperable.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] All I could do was
make a quick escape.
SV025.SV025_Area500_Talk_Hint_01_03:
[Npc:Icon chara="Charlie"/][UE:Meta key="b3f2603d5df94d7b8db623ad4cc19705" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]I don't know what I would've done after
the crash if not for all the survival
training I've had over the years.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="b3f2603d5df94d7b8db623ad4cc19705" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]As long as you've got food, water, and a
safe place to sleep,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] the rest'll work out.[etc:Wait frame="15"/]
Doesn't hurt to have a pal with you too.
SV025.SV025_Area500_Talk_Hint_01_02:
[Npc:Icon chara="Charlie"/][UE:Meta key="ee6648df63514586947b9dd24d75940a" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/]That guy who stole the juice...[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Where'd he
run off to?[etc:Wait frame="15"/] I'd like to get that juice back
sooner than later.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="ee6648df63514586947b9dd24d75940a" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="WaitGladNoVoice"/]Thinking of that bittersweet, slightly
sour smell...[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Just remembering it makes
me drool!
SV025.SV025_Area500_Talk_Hint_02_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Charlie"/][UE:Meta key="8c50988cac6a4dfcb4e64374d12c5576" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]Apparently, [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Alph"/]Yorke[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] started sending money
back home to his family even before he
became a treasure hunter.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="8c50988cac6a4dfcb4e64374d12c5576" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]That's just what you'd expect from the
oldest of 15 siblings.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] There's more to
that ol' softy than meets the eye.
SV025.SV025_Area500_Talk_Hint_02_02:
[Npc:Icon chara="Charlie"/][UE:Meta key="b95c939126954ca986db4e3d4314db05" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Sad"/]Thing is,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] us Koppaites eat a lot of fruit.[etc:Wait frame="15"/]
We can't eat most of that other stuff.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="b95c939126954ca986db4e3d4314db05" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="WaitSadNoVoice"/]Well,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I guess we could eat it.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Probably
more accurate to say we just don't like
the way it tastes.
SV025.SV025_Area500_Talk_Hint_02_03:
[Npc:Icon chara="Charlie"/][UE:Meta key="3489afd6736a425ebae35dbe7b6c7819" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]We were searching for treasure as part
of an effort to save Koppai from an
impending food shortage.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="3489afd6736a425ebae35dbe7b6c7819" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="TalkFaceOnly"/]Our plan was to sell those treasures to
buy food, [etc:Wait frame="8"/]and then send it back home.
SV025.SV025_Area500_Talk_Hint_03_02:
[Npc:Icon chara="Charlie"/][UE:Meta key="8e3de241825f4f20afa60e6c342e07f3" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]I've asked [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Brittany"/]Nelle[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] what she plans to do with
all the treasure we find.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] It's interesting.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="8e3de241825f4f20afa60e6c342e07f3" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]She said she'll sell it and use the profits
to invest in promising business ventures.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="8e3de241825f4f20afa60e6c342e07f3" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/]Something to do with plants or cultivation,[etc:Wait frame="8"/]
I think.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Didn't really understand it much,
to be honest.
SV025.SV025_Area500_Talk_Hint_03_03:
[Npc:Icon chara="Charlie"/][UE:Meta key="244c3ac06fe14a5ba720b234a30b1f58" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]Seeing how efficient you two are when
you're on the job reminds me of the days
when I was training to be a ranger.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="244c3ac06fe14a5ba720b234a30b1f58" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="TalkFaceOnly"/]But Ducky,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] on the other hand...[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Nah,[etc:Wait frame="8"/]
that's an old story.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] I'll leave it there.
SV025.SV025_Area500_Talk_Hint_03_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Charlie"/][UE:Meta key="61f87e3d7cc442abb3dfac15ced8c504" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/]You know,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] we keep on selling treasures
and buying up food...[etc:Wait frame="8"/]but is that doing
anything to solve the bigger issue?[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="61f87e3d7cc442abb3dfac15ced8c504" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="YesFaceOnly"/]We need to do something bigâ€”something
fundamental to save our home for real.
SV025.SV025_Area500_Talk_Hint_04_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Charlie"/][UE:Meta key="e5c8ea1e1c344c2e953c479d5027585c" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]Apparently other planets have sent
research task forces made up of
brilliant scientists to this place.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="e5c8ea1e1c344c2e953c479d5027585c" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]Speaking of scientists,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I've heard that
[Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Brittany"/]Nelle[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] has a relative who's a botanist.
SV025.SV025_Area500_Talk_Hint_04_02:
[Npc:Icon chara="Charlie"/][UE:Meta key="b6b168c9b3c74e61b849a2fd1a5edc17" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/]I'm not all that into treasures myself,[etc:Wait frame="8"/]
but sometimes you come across one that
just looks so delicious...[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="b6b168c9b3c74e61b849a2fd1a5edc17" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02FaceOnly"/]I've spent a few nights tossing and
turning over whether or not to sell or
eat a particular treasure.
SV025.SV025_Area500_Talk_Hint_04_03:
[Npc:Icon chara="Charlie"/][UE:Meta key="e4c54ade68d546709c07d55eb8090f0f" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]Watching you has taught me just how
important those Dandori and planning
skills really are.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="e4c54ade68d546709c07d55eb8090f0f" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]Maybe what us Koppaites need isn't some
new planet with lots of food...[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="e4c54ade68d546709c07d55eb8090f0f" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/]Maybe we just need to be proactive and
methodical about this thing.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] It could be
we just have to try growing our own food.
SV025.SV025_Area500_Talk_Hint_04_04:
[Npc:Icon chara="Charlie"/][UE:Meta key="46b1322d863a4344aaa2d1f20cd5c06f" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]I don't know what I would've done after
the crash if not for all the survival
training I've had over the years.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="46b1322d863a4344aaa2d1f20cd5c06f" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]As long as you've got food, water, and a
safe place to sleep,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] the rest'll work out.[etc:Wait frame="15"/]
Doesn't hurt to have a pal with you too.
SV025.SV025_Area500_Talk_Hint_04_05:
[Npc:Icon chara="Charlie"/][UE:Meta key="497631e349354e7e9434eb1eaa86b098" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]Apparently, [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Alph"/]Yorke[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] started sending money
back home to his family even before he
became a treasure hunter.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="497631e349354e7e9434eb1eaa86b098" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]That's just what you'd expect from the
oldest of 15 siblings.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] There's more to
that ol' softy than meets the eye.
SV025.SV025_Area500_Talk_Hint_04_06:
[Npc:Icon chara="Charlie"/][UE:Meta key="01f32569121c40a5946ff80d4a18fa50" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Sad"/]Thing is,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] us Koppaites eat a lot of fruit.[etc:Wait frame="15"/]
We can't eat most of that other stuff.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="01f32569121c40a5946ff80d4a18fa50" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="WaitSadNoVoice"/]Well,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I guess we could eat it.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Probably
more accurate to say we just don't like
the way it tastes.
SV025.SV025_Area500_Talk_Hint_04_07:
[Npc:Icon chara="Charlie"/][UE:Meta key="3246ac5516fe48b19cf2a5e8b740a280" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]We were searching for treasure as part
of an effort to save Koppai from an
impending food shortage.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="3246ac5516fe48b19cf2a5e8b740a280" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="TalkFaceOnly"/]Our plan was to sell those treasures to
buy food, [etc:Wait frame="8"/]and then send it back home.
SV025.SV025_Area500_Talk_Hint_04_08:
[Npc:Icon chara="Charlie"/][UE:Meta key="87d3502821684eb1b1475cc790542e14" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]I've asked [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Brittany"/]Nelle[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] what she plans to do with
all the treasure we find.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] It's interesting.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="87d3502821684eb1b1475cc790542e14" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]She said she'll sell it and use the profits
to invest in promising business ventures.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="87d3502821684eb1b1475cc790542e14" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/]Something to do with plants or cultivation,[etc:Wait frame="8"/]
I think.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Didn't really understand it much,
to be honest.
SV025.SV025_Area500_Talk_Hint_04_09:
[Npc:Icon chara="Charlie"/][UE:Meta key="2af772c611894c2b98b1f8dbdb5b529c" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]Seeing how efficient you two are when
you're on the job reminds me of the days
when I was training to be a ranger.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="2af772c611894c2b98b1f8dbdb5b529c" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="TalkFaceOnly"/]But Ducky,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] on the other hand...[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Nah,[etc:Wait frame="8"/]
that's an old story.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] I'll leave it there.
